item.description:
Dear Ensemble,

During this intensive rehearsal, we will practice the new warmups, drills, and games we learned two weeks ago. Emphasis will be placed during scenes on discovering the "game," creating "conflict," and resolving the "problem." In the second half of rehearsal, we will resolve a new show for upcoming performances, including one soon to be scheduled at Somerville Home. Subsequent rehearsals will work to fortify this show repertoire.

Please arrive on time, since there is a great deal to accomplish.

See you soon!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Dress Rehearsal
